member.name: P:OgcApi.Net.Schemas.Options.PropertyDescription.Format
member.summary:
Format of the string or spatial property.
For string property the Standard recommends using one of the following:
uri, uri-template, uuid, date-time, date, time, etc.
For spatial (geometry) property is one of:
geometry-point, geometry-multipoint, geometry-linestring, geometry-multilinestring, geometry-polygon, geometry-multipolygon, geometry-geometrycollection, geometry-any
